DOC.brief_summary: To compare antidepressant efficacy safety subject receive DVS-233 SR versus subject receive placebo .
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluating DVS-233 SR In Adult Outpatients With Major Depressive Disorder
DOC.criteria: Outpatients Sexually active woman participate study must use medically acceptable form contraception Subjects must primary diagnosis major depressive disorder Treatment DVS233 SR time past Treatment venlafaxine ( immediate release [ IR ] extend release [ ER ] ) within 90 day study day 1 Known hypersensitivity venlafaxine ( IR ER )
